TopicTitle: Natural Wonders - Devil's Tower - A proposal for Squad, or a clever modder

Articles.Content:
I took a trip out to Wyoming this weekend to go to Devil's Tower - the place at the end of Close Encounters of the Third Kind.

Squad - this would be an awesome place to add to the geography of Kerbin or another planet. It's an interesting geologic formation. It's got a tie to classic sci-fi and it's great for little aviation challenges:

[http://www.nps.gov/deto/learn/historyculture/first-fifty-years-george-hopkins.htm](http://www.nps.gov/deto/learn/historyculture/first-fifty-years-george-hopkins.htm)

Tell me this wouldn't be a fun place to fly around:

![qS6CHHZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qS6CHHZ.jpg)

Anyone up to the challenge of making it a terrain mod? It's not like it has to be exact. An approximation would be good enough. It'd also be a fun companion piece to the Mun arches.

Could be a fun thing to find on Duna...
